title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be displayed even when dataset is not set
OB: An error is shown when attempting to create a new table group without setting the dataset.
EB: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be displayed even when dataset is not set. Add a table report item without setting the dataset and try creating a new table group. The user should be able to define a group even if the dataset is not defined.
SR:
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Try creating a new table group.
